transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Sir, good afternoon.
Executive: Good afternoon.
Customer: Sir, ek main machine purchase kiya tha. Ek company se.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To unko main payment kar diya. Abhi kal reply lekar aaya.
Executive: Aapka aur aapki na voice thoda sa echo kar rahi hai. Echo thoda sa loud bolenge sir aapki clear voice nahi aa rahi hai. Aur kaunsi company se baat kar rahe hain sir abhi aap?
Customer: Udhar se bhi kya hai, udhar bhi woh aawaz nahi aa raha hai. Ha, ye bol raha hu sir. Abhi aa raha hai?
Executive: Ha, abhi clear hai sir.
Customer: Ha, ye bol raha hu ki kya naam hai ki humne ek instrument purchase kiya tha company se. Woh log IndiaMART pe listed hai, thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Main payment, woh log bol rahe the unhone submit kiya. Aur humne payment kiya. To abhi tracking number ke liye maine unko call kiya to call hi nahi receive kar rahe hain.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Main IndiaMART se call kar raha hu to woh bhi nahi receive kar rahe hain.
Executive: Thik hai. Aap sir ek, aap sir ek baar apni company ka naam bataiyega.
Customer: Mere company ka naam hai EMC Instruments.
Executive: Kaunsi sir?
Customer: EMC Instruments.
Executive: EMC, acha okay, thik hai. To aapne sir ye buy kara tha ya matlab sale kara tha matlab ek baar thoda dobara bataiyega thoda sa voice echo kar raha tha.
Customer: Purchase kara tha.
Executive: Thik hai.
Executive: Kis company se sir purchase kara tha woh bhi bata dijiyega ek baar, kis company se?
Customer: Kya sir?
Executive: Company ka naam bata dijiye sir, kaunsi company se purchase kara tha aap bata rahe hain na registered hai woh bhi.
Customer: Company ka naam bata raha hu.
Executive: Ji, ji, ji.
Customer: Company ka naam hai inka Instruments and Machinery Sales Corporation.
Executive: To main
Customer: And machinery
Executive: Sales corporation.
Customer: Inka koi number hai to mujhe dijiye na main contact kar lu.
Executive: Call nahi receive kar rahe hain ye.
Customer: Mumbai ki company hai, Mumbai se deal hua hai kya?
Customer: Ha, ha, Mumbai, Goa karke Goa town aise karke tha. Mumbai ka company hai ye.
Executive: Ha ji sir, Mumbai ki main ek baar search kar liya. Thik hai, ek minute.
Executive: To koi number hai aap ya conference kara sakte hain kisi ka?
Customer: Main dekh leta hu.
Executive: Conference kara sakte hain?
Executive: Conference nahi ho payega sir ye Mumbai ki company hai main ek baar dekh leta hu. Number ek baar dekh leta hu, conference nahi ho payega. Line pe hi rahiye ga. Koi nahi dekhiye sir aap log, aap logo ke IndiaMART pe kam se kam 5 lakh ka package chal raha hai.
Customer: Hmm, hmm, nahi nahi uski kya pareshani hai.
Executive: Koi nahi sir ho jayega. Definitely aapke, aapke jo concern hota hai. Abhi sir ye deal hua kab hai sir?
Customer: Sir kal hi hua tha, kal humne payment kiya tha. Mujhe just ye kehna hai ki mujhe just ye kehna hai ki unhone bhej diya to mujhe tracking number de de ya nahi bheja to kuch to reply kare. Woh acche se main message kar raha hu online hai lekin reply nahi kar rahe hain. Ab call kar de to receive nahi kar rahe hain. Main kya bolu sir bataiye.
Executive: Unko boliye sir ki itna bada company hai inka 1973 se company chal raha hai aur 50 saal ka company credibility ye log 6000 ke liye daba de rahe hain.
Customer: Samajh gaya sir, koi nahi. Main ek baar collect karta hu inse bhi. Aur ek baar iska mobile number aap jo sir puch rahe hain woh bhi ek baar bata deta hu.
Executive: Ha bataiye number dijiye to dekho, jo number mere paas hai wohi number aap de lekin bataiye to.
Executive: Ha main check kar leta hu.
Executive: Aapke paas sir abhi kaunsa number hai? Last ka three digit bataiyega.
Customer: Mere paas kya sir?
Executive: Last, last ka three digit sir bataiyega ek baar.
Customer: Last ka three 2160.
Executive: 160.
Executive: 160, okay. Starting mein I think 98 hoga mera.
Customer: Ha, ha, 98 hai starting mein 21
Executive: 60 last mein. Iske alawa sir mere paas
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Wohi number hai kya aapke paas bhi sir?
Customer: Ha, nahi mere paas ek aur aadhaar number bhi hai. Main aapko number de de raha hu aap baat kar lijiyega. But iske liye ek baar main unke account mein bhi baat kar leta hu, no issue. Aap number note down kariega.
Customer: Ha, ha, rukiye bataiye sir bataiye.
Executive: Ji sir number likhiyega. 99
Customer: 99
Executive: 694
Customer: 99
Executive: Sir do baar 99?
Executive: Nahi sir ek baar hai 99.
Customer: 99
Executive: 694
Customer: 694
Executive: 77
Customer: 77
Executive: 401
Customer: 401
Executive: 77
Executive: 401, right ha.
Executive: Inka kya naam hoga sir, naam kya hoga inka?
Executive: Naam to sir aise main confirm nahi bata sakta hu but name jo likha hua hai Ajay naam se mention hai.
Customer: Ajay to woh abhi number Ajay ji ka hi hai. Chaliye thik hai, koi nahi.
Executive: Ha ho sakta hai ki shayad ye dono, ha ye dono number Ajay ji ke ho ya kisi staff ka number ho. Ye mere paas do company ke number the.
Executive: Ek baar is number pe aap collect kare. Sir yahi do number hai hamare paas ek to aapke paas already hai ek ye wala number maine aapko diya hai. Aap isse ek baar collect kar lijiyega.
Customer: Ha agar koi, bilkul agar koi response nahi aaya mere ko WhatsApp pe baat kar lijiyega main aapko guide kar dunga fir aap ye kya process kar sakte hain iske liye aur, thik hai?
Customer: Ha, ha, thik hai, thik hai, thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir, okay, thank you.
Customer: Thik hai, thik hai, thik hai, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer purchased a machine, paid but no tracking.

- Seller not responding to calls or messages.



Resolution:

- Executive assured resolution and noted the concern.

- Provided an alternate contact number for the seller.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to contact executive on WhatsApp if needed.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- purchase, tracking, unresponsive seller, contact number
